channel.title: Cannot figure out how to change serve name on server. LOOK!
channel.description: i am having trouble findinout how to change messages in your quest tab. like when you log into your server, it says fir example "server created by WAR or someting when you log in. how do i change that to what i want? can anybody help me please :P

item.title: Cannot figure out how to change serve name on server. LOOK!
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Lord_Pker Pk Lord Pker
item.description:
@Pk_Lord_Pker wrote:

well it could be in the texthandler class or the client class… check both of them with crtl+f.
[/quote]

nop that just for changing the text’s but his saying he wants to change the QUEST TAB stuff!

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot figure out how to change serve name on server. LOOK!

how do i change that to what i want?
can anybody help me please :P[/quote]

item.title: Cannot figure out how to change serve name on server. LOOK!
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

Go into your Client.java, then search for that message
Change it to what you want it to be, than save, and compile it.

Read full topic
